attributes.action: make period products free for everyone
attributes.additional_details: every single person with female anatomy has a period at some point in their life. women living in poverty don’t have access to sanitary products such as pads or tampons, instead they have to use old newspapers or rags which is extremely unhygienic and extremely dangerous. they need to make them free for everyone.
attributes.background: you must make period products free. if men had periods they would be free but because it’s women we have to pay every month. for example, condoms are free, there for men. you don’t have to have sex. every woman has a period. it’s not fair and it’s not right. it needs to be changed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643551
